ARABIC: وَمَآ أَكْثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوْ حَرَصْتَ بِمُؤْمِنِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But most people, for all your eagerness, are not muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Many men will not believe howsoever you wish,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And most of the people, howsoever you might so desire, are not going to believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However hard you try, most people will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And however much you long for, most men will not accept faith.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And most of mankind will not believe even if you desire it eagerly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most men will not believe though you desire it eagerly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Yet, be thou ever so eager, the most part of men believe not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And though thou try much, most men will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Yet most men will not become believers, no matter how eager you may be.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And most of the people, though thou desiredest ardently, are not going to be believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Yet most people will not have faith, however eager you should be.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yet no faith will the greater part of mankind have, however ardently thou dost desire it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And most of mankind will not believe even if you desire it eagerly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Even though you are so eager, most people will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But most people, for all your eagerness, are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And most of the people, although you strive [for it], are not believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:103] Yet, most people, that is, the people of Mecca, however eager you might be, that they believe, will not believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And though thou try much) no matter how hard you try, (most men) the people of Mecca (will not believe) in the scriptures and messengers.
